response.original_title: Der Diwan, Staat und Religion im Islam
response.overview: The historian Julien Loiseau, an expert on the Islamic world of the Middle Ages, is a guest on the program. Together with him, ARTE goes in search of clues: from the sultan's harem to the council chamber, from the ruler's seat to the paper register, the word “divan” reveals the most diverse stages of political development in Islam.
response.title: Der Diwan, Staat und Religion im Islam

titles.title: Le diwan, une histoire de l'État en islam
